title: General
fullText: All other electrical equipment on site, including power tools, flexible cords, cord extension sets and portable socket-outlet assemblies, shall be tested by a competent person in accordance with Clauses 3.5.2 and 3.5.3, as appropriate, and inspected in accordance with the methods of AS/NZS 3760, before being put into service and thereafter at intervals not exceeding those listed in Table 6 of this Standard.
